allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: add mypy to pre-commit, remove root __init__.py

- Add mypy type checking to pre-commit hooks
- Remove root __init__.py that caused duplicate module name errors
- Parent directory renamed to apm_instrumentation_toolkit \(underscores\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/william.conti/Documents/dd-trace/dd-trace-js/apm-instrumentation-toolkit-e2e-testing commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(tests\): add E2E workflow testing infrastructure

Add comprehensive E2E testing infrastructure for APM workflows:

- MockRunner/RecordingRunner for agent mocking at spawn_agent level
- AgentCall dataclass captures prompt, skills, model, max_turns, etc.
- Shared fixtures for workflow setup \(analyze_workflow_patches, setup_analyze_workflow\)
- --record flag support for regenerating fixtures with real agents

Test coverage for AnalyzeWorkflow:
- Execution flow tests \(test_execution.py\)
- Resume/checkpoint tests \(test_resume.py\)
- Prompt validation tests \(test_prompt_validation.py\)
  - Variable substitution verification
  - Schema injection validation
  - Skills configuration validation
  - Agent config \(model, max_turns, timeout\) flow-through

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)" --no-verify)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
test: add e2e workflow for LLMObs trace validation

Triple-nested workflow structure to test tracing visualization:
- OuterWorkflow > MiddleWorkflow > InnerWorkflow
- Mix of agent steps \(haiku\) and normal steps
- Pydantic models for all I/O

Run with:
    DD_LLMOBS_ENABLED=1 DD_LLMOBS_ML_APP=anubis-test     python tests/e2e/test_trace_workflow.py

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
